entry.title: I don‚Äôt hate my Mac - Switching to Apple Pt. 2

media:group.media:title: I don‚Äôt hate my Mac - Switching to Apple Pt. 2
media:group.media:description:
Order the NexiGo TriVision Ultra at: https://lmg.gg/NexiGoTriVision
We spent two months living the Mac life, and it wasn‚Äôt exactly smooth sailing. The hardware impressed us, and some of the features were genuinely great, but clunky UI quirks, frustrating compatibility problems, and unreliable Wi-Fi on a $10,000 Mac Pro reminded us that macOS still has its issues. We break down what worked, what didn‚Äôt, and why at least one of us hasn‚Äôt switched back.
Discuss on the forum: https://linustechtips.com/topic/1614927-i-don%E2%80%99t-hate-my-mac-switching-to-apple-pt-2/
Check out the M4 MacBook Pro: https://geni.us/314j3 Check out the M2 MacBook Air: https://geni.us/SB839

entry.title: Building a $12,000 PC in a Random Asian Tech Mall

media:group.media:title: Building a $12,000 PC in a Random Asian Tech Mall
media:group.media:description:
Thanks to ASUS for sponsoring this video! ASUS is celebrating 30 years of graphics card innovation with a global campaign honoring the community that made it all possible. To mark the occasion, ASUS is hosting a global charity auction from June 4‚Äì13. One lucky winner will take home a limited-edition RTX 5090 Dhahab Edition, signed by NVIDIA's CEO Jensen Huang.
Learn more here: http://www.asus.com/us/site/rogastralcharity
Linus returns to 'random Asian tech mall‚Äô in Taipei to challenge PC Builders from 3 shops to build him a custom watercooled gaming PC worthy of his new ROG Astral GeForce RTX‚Ñ¢ 5090 Dhahab Edition graphics card. The results? Good lord‚Ä¶
Go check out the video where we got the gold GPU: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eiGd1wcgk7M
